content.description: The following question refers to the topic of the printing press.
content.question: Which of the following best explains how the printing press contributed to the development of national cultures in Europe?

choices.label: The printing press encouraged the spread of vernacular literature.
The printing press allowed for easier publication of laws and legal findings.
The printing press led to the creation of guilds and craft associations dedicated to the production of books and pamphlets.
The printing press encouraged the spread of humanist ideas from Italy to northern Europe.

content.answer: The printing press encouraged the spread of vernacular literature.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
